This information is required for medical reasons such as the ability to write accurate prescriptions. This may also be used for insurance purposes.
I agree to the terms of service
The consumer account was created with no password. The server will generate a random password for you. Please check your email for an email containing information about the generated password.
A password is required to enroll

By requesting access to this child\'s profile, I hereby certify that I am the parent or legal guardian of this child. If, at anytime, I am no longer authorized to access this child\'s profile, due to a court order or for any other reason, I agree to notify %1$s immediately.

By clicking the \"%1$s\" button below, you are hereby authorizing %2$s to grant %3$s access to the child\'s profile and are certifying that %4$s is the parent or legal guardian of the child. If, at anytime, %5$s is no longer authorized to access this child\'s profile due to a court order or for any other reason of which you become aware, you agree to notify %6$s immediately.
%1$s has requested access to one or more of your children\'s profiles. This allows him or her to view medical history and have visits on the dependent\'s behalf.

It looks like your child already has a profile under another parent or guardian's account. It is recommended that you request to link your account to the child's pre-existing profile.

You will then be able to have a visit on the child's behalf and access his or her visit history.

Please enter the email address that the other parent/guardian uses on General Hospital.

If your child already has a profile under another parent or guardian's account, we will send a request to link your account to the child’s profile.

You will then be able to have a visit on the child's behalf and access his or her visit history.

Please enter the email address that the other parent/guardian uses on General Hospital.
We have send a request to %1$s. We will notify you when your request is accepted so that you can have a visit for this child.
Do Not Grant This Person Access
You already have %1$s %2$s born on %3$s as a dependent.
Looks like you were just here. To save time,\nwe can copy the information you provided for\nyour last visit.
Someone has requested to link one of your children\'s profile.
You have a scheduled visit starting soon.
We were unable to reach your health plan.
The price you\'ll see is the maximum amount you could pay without coverage. We won\'t charge you until we hear back from your health plan.
When we hear back from your health plan, we\'ll process your payment and send you a confirmation
